channel.title: More than 1 owner?
channel.description: So my friend and i own a rsps that we're working on and i have a lot more commands than he does and his rights are set to 2 just as mine. Is there a way to make 2 owners or a place to make him co-owner? I've been looking how but all i can see is "how to make yourself admin/owner".

item.title: More than 1 owner?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Generally, adding a second owner is the exact same concept of making oneself owner, but with a second account…

With the little information you provided, that’s basically all the help i can give.

Read full topic

item.title: More than 1 owner?
